author: kiwi.eth
content: Looks great, thanks for doing it!

author: notpr0
content: I understand base fee would be needed but i dont agree with it being fully burned and tips being the new fee model because thats what will happen. If theres no reason for miners to put transactions with tips no transactions without tips will get in so tips become the way they get in. I understand the burn. Base fee designs just bad though

author: sky.cactus
content: Tips *are* required, removing miner payments is not a goal of 1559.

author: sky.cactus
content: 1559 is (essentially) a load leveling mechanism that significantly improves the common-case for transaction inclusion.

author: timbeiko
content: The 1559 Dev Fund Gitcoin Grant is live: https://gitcoin.co/grants/946/project-title-eip-1559-community-fund
